subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Atlanta’s Freddie Freeman won the fan voting for the last spot on the National League All-Star roster, meaning the Dodgers’ rookie sensation, Yasiel Puig, did not make the squad.
snippet: Atlanta’s Freddie Freeman won the fan voting for the last spot on the National League All-Star roster, meaning the Dodgers’ rookie sensation, Yasiel Puig, did not make the squad.
